mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM address a, member m WHERE a.member_id = m.member_id AND m.user_id = #{userId} AND default_address = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(member_id, name, recipient, phone_num, zip_code, main_address, detail_address, default_address) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{name}, #{recipient}, #{phoneNum}, #{zipCode},#{mainAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{defaultAddress})
